entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 6 except minus 13 inland.
